21-1115.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the Federal Legislation Committee meeting held Thursday, April 29, 2021.A motion was made by Vice Chair Supernaw, seconded by Member Saro, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Saro, Supernaw and RichardsonPage 1 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 12:00 PMTUESDAY, OCTOBER 26, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHFEDERAL LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTES2.

21-1116.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation regarding federal infrastructure package negotiations.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Richardson spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Richardson and Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs.Vice Chair Supernaw spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.Councilwoman Saro spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Councilwoman Saro and Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs.A motion was made by Vice Chair Supernaw, seconded by Member Saro, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Saro, Supernaw and Richardson3.
